body_html: Yes, it's possible. CUDA and CPU algorithms differ. This has been reported multiple times and we don't plan to always unify them, because it would decrease CUDA perf dramatically. All outputs you posted are valid in this case.
body_text: Yes, it's possible. CUDA and CPU algorithms differ. This has been reported multiple times and we don't plan to always unify them, because it would decrease CUDA perf dramatically. All outputs you posted are valid in this case.
body: Yes, it's possible. CUDA and CPU algorithms differ. This has been reported multiple times and we don't plan to always unify them, because it would decrease CUDA perf dramatically. All outputs you posted are valid in this case.
